messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4972
messages.msgSnippet: on 10/4/04 8:27 PM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at ... My parents made me brush my teeth - I have a mouth full of silver and many teeth missing due
messages.messageBody:
on 10/4/04 8:27 PM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I just had a molar pulled, went bad because of an old deep cavity and it hurt
> like sin for a week. I didn't blame my parents. I recognize what that in the
> bigger picture of the free and loving childhood I had, one that led me to
> unschooling ultimately, a tooth is a small sacrifice.
> Dawn (who's actually lost two teeth, had a couple of root canals and has a
> mouthful of silver. Ah, but life is good! :) )

My parents made me brush my teeth - I have a mouth full of silver and many
teeth missing due to root canals.

My son hardly ever brushes his teeth - he's never had cavity.

I think when he wants to attract girls, he'll start brushing so that his
breath doesn't stink <gg>.

Paula
